descriptionHtml:
I rearranged Malukah\'s excellent rendition of \"The Dragonborn Comes/Main Theme\" and substituted it as the opening screen music for TESV: Skyrim. I shortened it quite a bit, and removed \"The Dragonborn Comes\" from the arrangement. Total runtime clocks in right around 60 seconds.

Malukah\'s full performance: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g
YouTube showing the mod: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MIyv18ta34

The second version, now included with v1.1, is a more somber performance by Malukah. Compared with the other version, this one is mostly unedited. The runtime for this version is also around 60 seconds.

Maluka\'s full performance #2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1vZ3UaAytc
YouTube showing the mod #2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sz59vjeip20

v1.2 now properly supports the Nexus Mod Manager.
author: Rageaholic
